SDL_GetHint.Title: SDL_GetHint
SDL_GetHint.Summary: Use this function to get the value of a hint.
SDL_GetHint.Function Parameters: **`name`** - the hint to query; see the list of hints on [CategoryHints](https://wiki.libsdl.org/SDL_GetHintCategoryHints#Hints) for details
SDL_GetHint.Return Value: Returns the string value of a hint or NULL if the hint isn't set.
SDL_GetHint.Code Examples:
```cpp
You can add your code example here
```
